projects.title: NoteHub
projects.description: Lightweight platform that lets you view Markdown notes directly from GitHub repositories, with a clean interface adaptable to any device.

projects.title: SaveX
projects.description: A platform that allows users to compare the prices of products between different supermarkets.

projects.title: Bits of Battle
projects.description: A 1vs1 game to play in local with a friend using the same keyboard. Project made for La Hackathon del Dev.

projects.title: Notion Lovers
projects.description: A student-led platform for sharing and accessing university notes. Join us in revolutionizing study habits!

projects.title: MiniShell
projects.description: Simplified Unix/Linux shell built in C that emulates the behavior of a native terminal.

projects.title: Wallapop Scrapper
projects.description: A simple wallapop scraping integration with a telegram bot.
